FOTO a THON special interest organization is fulfilling the fantasies of students who want to see their professors ingest insects shave their heads or dress like cheerleaders through a new fundraiser dubbed Teacher Torture. from Monday Oct PERIOD  to Friday Oct PERIOD  students will be able to donate money to see one Penn State faculty member subjected to a professorselected method of torture to raise funds for the Interfraternity CouncilPanhellenic Dance Marathon FOTO Executive Fundraising Chairwoman Sara Selverian said PERIOD

Collection jars will be placed in the teachers classrooms throughout the week and more jars will be available for donations in the HUBRobeson Center from Wednesday to Friday Selverian sophomorepolitical science and broadcast journalism said PERIOD

To jumpstart the event FOTO asked Penn State professors to nominate peers who would be willing to undergo a funny form of torture PERIOD Josh Wede Christopher Calkins Barry Bram Andrew Peck Denise Woodward and Russell Frank all accepted the nomination because of the cause Selverian said PERIOD

The professor who receives the most donations will have to publicly follow through with his or her planned torture PERIOD

Selverian said the torture fundraiser was created as a way to get the faculty and the students working together to raise money for THON PERIOD

Its tough for students to get student fundraising Selverian said PERIOD Sometimes theres a big split and a lot of teachers are like I donate hundreds to THON but if youre working with the students its so much more enjoyable. the professors are involved to help raise money in way that can connect with their pupils PERIOD

THON is a great organization and I thought this is something I could do that could potentially be beneficial to the organization said Wede a psychology lecturer who plans to dress as a cheerleader if he wins PERIOD I thought itd be a great way to try and raise money. woodward a biology lecturer whose students voted via iclicker for her to eat something gross as her torture echoed Wedes comments PERIOD

I am impressed with THONs record of giving and the dedication of the students involved PERIOD I try to volunteer on a regular basis she said PERIOD

Meanwhile those like Michael Johnson a student in Wedes PSYCH  Introductory to Psychology class are ready to donate money for the effort albeit with ulterior motives PERIOD

Aside from being a good cause Im throwing down a good amount of money to see my teacher be humiliated Johnson freshmandivision of undergraduate studies said PERIOD Im not sure why youd dress up as a cheerleader but its going to be hilarious. the faculty had a good sense of humor about the potential humiliation PERIOD

Id like to raise a lot of money but earn one less dollar then one of the other instructors Wede said with a laugh PERIOD I might even promote for my competition to avoid dressing up. some jokingly threatened punishment against the students who decided their fate PERIOD

If I end up eating something gross all students who voted for that torture will be penalized a grade Woodward joked PERIOD

For all the humor of the event there remains a very serious element that resonates with the fundraiser PERIOD

Peck is willing to eat using only his face and if it means making a difference in the fight against cancer PERIOD

Cancer took my grandparents and my mother PERIOD Currently my fatherinlaw is battling cancer Peck said PERIOD Being involved in the Teacher Torture gives me the opportunity to play a small role in an amazing effort to do something incredible. if youre interested in submitting a Letter to the Editor click here PERIOD
